resources.string: The configuration to start the game isn\'t correct. Remember that you must select at least one type of game.
Are you sure you want to quit?
You must enter a name for the player
You can\'t create empty or negative teams
There can not be more teams than players
Alright!! You can tell whoever you want to drink %d
That\'s what we like, tell whoever you want to drink %d
This game is wonderful, right?? Tell whoever you want to drink %d and recommend Prost & Drink to more people
This is just a game… Drink %d, you better answer the next one
You haven\'t understood how to play. You have to be brave, drink %d
Still shy? Drink %d to loosen up
In this game we like brave people. You can tell whoever you want to drink %d
Don\'t you think your friends are too sober? Deal %d drinks
Very well!! For your bravery, you get to choose who drinks %d
Cloc-cloc!! Chicken. Cowards have to drink. Drink %d
You haven\'t understood how to play. You have to be brave, drink %d to see if we can get you to loosen up
There\'s something that doesn\'t work. Cowards stay at home. Drink %d and next time don't wuss out
Those who have voted %s can choose who they want to drink %d
Player %s has already finished his \'Until next turn\'
You must enter a number of teams
There\'s a problem with the camera and you can\'t take the picture
There\'s a problem with the internet connection. You won\'t be able to share the image
I send you this photo. Prost&Drink
How wonderful is this game! Toast and drink %d
Image taken for the challenge that you are going to share
You are still too sober… Deal %d drinks
Very well! Tell someone to drink %d
You do have a way with words. Choose someone and he has to drink %d
Alcohol is starting to work… Drink %d
Icon of an ear to hear the tongue twister
Very well! Order someone to drink %d
In this game you\'ll have to get the needle of the meter in the correct position. To do this you must rotate the phone to make it move. Pay attention to the clues.
The most important thing is to participate. Drink %d.
Not bad at all. Tell whoever you want to %d drink.
The terror of the moles! Tell whoever you want to drink %d, legend.
In this game you have 30 seconds to crush the maximum number of moles possible.
Watch out! Hitting a hole without a mole incurs a small penalty.
And first of all… \nDon\'t kill the lucky gnome! \nOr you will be gnomed.
Uh ho ho, uh ha ha. I am gnot an elf, I am not a gnoblin, I\'m a gnome! And you\'ve been… GNOMED!
Game box where a hole, a mole or a gnome will appear

We go with a different game this time. Try to find the North. You\'ll have 3 attempts to point your phone at it. In each attempt there will be a countdown of 3 seconds and then you\'ll see a compass. Will you be able to orient yourself?
You\'re too sober yet if you can still find the North… Drink %d
Alright. You\'ve found the North. You can tell whoever you want to drink %d
Be careful, you got lost. This time don\'t drink. Give your %d to whoever you want
Oops Don\'t you have any orientation whatsoever? Drink %d
You aren\'t very good at this. Drink %d and better luck next time. Oh, and maybe stay away from casinos.
Image of the card on board
Good memory. Send whomever you want to drink %d
Damn, maybe next time. Drink %d drinks
In this game we\'ll show you a series of cards. \nYou must remember their position. \nAfter a while, we\'ll hide them and you should try to find the one we asked for.
You have 10 seconds to memorize where the cards are. \nPay attention. \nWhen you\'re ready, hit the button.
Image of the letter that has to be found
Image of a letter that can be searched
Those who have take a shot

Thanks for using Prost & Drink. The app has two main parts, a draw functionality to draw teams, group items randomly…, and the Prost & Drink game itself. Let's explain briefly everything you can do here.

From the start screen of the application you can access the draw section. There you can set up a player list, the number of teams you want to make and, by clicking on the button, the application will generate the teams you want. This option is useful for when you want to play other games such as pool or board games.

The games works like this: At the top of the screen you\'ll see which player\'s turn it is. Before launching the game you will have to input the name of the players, it\'s recommended that you don\'t put two players with the same name. The game is endless, through it you will be presented with questions, challenges and mini-games. Don\'t forget to fill the glass.

In this game you\'ve to try to point your phone to the North. You\'ll have 3 attempts, in which you\'ll be shown a countdown to look for it. After you run out of time you can see the compass to know the actual position of the North.
For the friends who aren\'t physically with you. In this game you\'ll be challenged to take a picture of something from the party and share it. Let them wish they were with you.

Surely you have all played Whack-a-Mole sometime. Try to kill as many moles as you can in 30 seconds, but be careful, if you make a mistake you\'ll be penalized. Watch out for the lucky gnome, you don't want to hit it.
Let yourself go. Until the game tells you otherwise, you\'ve to do something. You just have to read the message and… follow the game wishes!
The application will ask you questions (maybe a bit personal ;)). If you don\'t answer you\'ll have to drink. Let\'s see if alcohol loosens you up.
Do you got what it takes? If you dare to do the challenges that we propose, you\'ll have a reward, otherwise you will be punished.

Kind of hard to understand a drunk guy\'s speak right?. Maybe your phone can. Try to say the tongue twister we propose to its mic. It will understand. Remember… At the microphone, not at the pub's column!
Easy, simple and for the whole group. Survey everyone to see which option they prefer from the ones we give you. Click the most voted option and the application\'ll tell you what to do.
In this game you only have to guess the card that is face down. Three cards will appear, one by one. And you will be asked if it is red or black, or even or odd. Try to hit them all.
In this game we show you 12 cards. You will have 10 seconds to memorize their position, after which, we will flip the cards. We will show you a letter and we will ask you where it is.
This activity is group. A sentence of the type of "Never have I ever done X" is enunciated. Those members of the group who have ever done so should have a drink.
Make sure you always have your glass filled up
There\'ll appear games that will tell you what to do, you have to answer everything and dare to perform the challenges
If you still have doubts we\'ll show you the instructions
I think I got it, chief
Write down the name of the players. \nYou can hold one pressed to remove it from the list.
Add the names and set the number of teams desired.\nIf you want to remove a player, hold their name pressed.

Do you need to cheer up a bit for the night?
We also find ourselves in the need sometimes and after a long time using other people's applications we decided to take the matter in our own hands.
We are 3 students of Computer Engineering that we have proposed this application for the subject of Mobile Devices Software Development. 
We hope you enjoy it.

Samuel Cifuentes García
Enol García González
Jorge Iturrioz del Vigo
